Description:
X Rebirth - a new milestone in the history of the development of a series of space simulator X. At this time the developers have ventured into long begs the " reset." Instead of going on about the insatiable fans who were constantly asking the universe to expand - adding new sectors , new ships , new features , etc. , from which the series has not evolved qualitatively , but only quantitatively , Bernd Lekhan and the German team Egosoft decided to start with a clean sheet and make their dreams finally Cosmos .
